title: Lupin III: Moeyo Zantetsuken! (Dub)
alternative_title: Lupin III: Dragon of Doom, ルパン三世『燃えよ斬鉄剣』
description: A Hong Kong crime boss contracts Lupin, Fujiko and Jigen to recover a legendary dragon statue that sunk with the Titanic. Unfortunately for them, the dragon is a treasure of Goemon's clan, said to have power exceeding that of his Zantetsuken sword; he resolves to protect the statue at all costs, even if it means killing his old friends.
